description.name: eurcerc20
description.tagline: EURC erc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto erc20-eurc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept EURC erc20 directly on your website
Unique erc20/eurc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your erc20/eurc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
